document.full_text: demands for freedom and justice sweeping the arab world, fueled by the power of social media, have brought an unprecedented opportunity for an improvement in human rights, amnesty international said friday.
document.title: arab world's drive for freedom in the balance: amnesty
lines_and_colors: demands for freedom and justice sweeping the arab world, fueled by the power of social media, have brought an unprecedented opportunity for an improvement in human rights, amnesty international said friday.
